mapper.sql: id, name, age, photo, introduce, profession, salary, status, create_at, update_at
mapper.select: select from student where status=#{status,jdbcType=BIT} order by salary desc
mapper.insert: insert into student (id, name, age, photo, introduce, profession, salary, status, create_at, update_at) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salary,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createAt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateAt,jdbcType=BIGINT})

update student
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

photo = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
introduce = #{introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
profession = #{profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT},
create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_at = #{updateAt,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
